name: CRUSH GB
description:
Beta Access

Hey the demo is short, but you can have more. Supporters of my Ko-fi page get beta access to the game + a bunch of gifts like: Batman Knightmare Messen HD Pack and sprite sheets.

Go now! https://ko-fi.com/saltandpixel 

STORY

The year is 40XX. A war corporation, known as CRUSH, create enhanced soldiers. 

The organic properties of a cadet are replaced with cybernetic systems. Parts of the brain are replaced with bio controllers. Often against their will. The procedure is slow and painful. They are both alive and dead.

But one soldier has awakened.
